prompts: Create a fighting-type Pokemon with a muscular build and a martial arts uniform.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies strength and discipline, inspired by martial arts.
Design a Pokemon that is skilled in hand-to-hand combat and has an intense aura.
Imagine a bipedal creature with a red face and a black belt, representing bravery.
Generate a Pokemon that looks fierce and determined, with a focus on combat techniques.
Give me a Pokemon that showcases power and agility, perfect for martial arts battles.
Make a Pokemon that has a unique, anthropomorphic design with a fighting style.
